scripts.env:prodLoginTest: cross-env test_env=prod npx playwright test tests/Login. --grep @regression --project=chrome --reporter=line,allure-playwright
scripts.env:prodWalletTest: cross-env test_env=prod npx playwright test tests/wallet. --project=chrome --reporter=line,allure-playwright
scripts.env:prodPlanTest: cross-env test_env=prod npx playwright test tests/plan. --project=chrome --reporter=line,allure-playwright
scripts.env:prodRegressionTest: cross-env test_env=prod npx playwright test tests/plan. --project=firefox --reporter=line,allure-playwright
